product_name: Pearl Izumi Quest Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A simple, classic design, the men's Pearl Izumi Quest Bike Jersey offers excellent comfort and high performance during warm-weather rides. Polyester blend fabric provides cool comfort by quickly wicking away perspiration, and it also offers excellent stretch for freedom of movement. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Generous 13.5 in. front zipper controls ventilation. 3 rear pockets store cycling essentials and food. The Pearl Izumi Quest Bike Jersey has reflective hits to increase visibility in dim light. Semifitted design is not too tight and not too loose and helps prevent fabric from flapping in slipstream. Closeout.
short_description: A simple, classic design, the men's Pearl Izumi Quest Bike Jersey offers excellent comfort and high performance during warm-weather rides.
